name: Westminster
body:
## [Download free from the App Store](http://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/westminster/id427180464?mt=8&uo=4)
### Features
* **Preps:** Check your homework for the day
* **Noticeboard:** Check notices from the online intranet
* **Menu:** Check what's on the menu for breakfast, lunch, or dinner

### Coming soon in version 2.0
* **Timetables:** See your personalised timetable

### Screenshots
![Timetable - Coming soon](http://i.imgur.com/WdLQo.png)
![Prep reminders](http://i.imgur.com/XEROb.png)
![The noticeboard](http://i.imgur.com/tylaC.png)
![The menu](http://i.imgur.com/Ap8sB.png)
tagline: An iOS app for Westminster School
